Articles.Content:
In the future, it would be cool if KSC-2 was upgraded to be more realistic and usable, but I hope that the buildings still resemble the old KSC buildings, just for the sake of pure nostalgia. Also, in future R&D, perhaps you could fly to KSC-2 and gain access to the old pre-0.18 parts. The parts would be updated with smoother textures (still resembling the old textures) and post-0.18 statistics, of course, but they could act as cheaper, lighter, less efficient alternatives in career mode.

The same thing could go for the island airstrip near KSC-1. You could land there and have access to things like seaplane pontoons, airbrakes, electric propellers and airship equipment.

Also, if "Jebediah's Junkyard" is added, you could get things like garbage can solid boosters, welding torch RCS thrusters and other near-useless items of hilarity.

Edited August 24, 2013 by JMBuilder
That is a brilliant idea! I hope the devs see this

+1

Please Squad please?

P.S.: If we could do something with that crashed saucer.....

That would be awesome! I really hope that the Devs take note of this!!
If not at KSC2, it should definitely be somewhere. Everyone loves a bit of nostalgia.
OH! Idea! I'll put it in the original post!

Jeb's Junkyard would be a hilarious easter egg XD

Even if it were just a building or area on the outskirts of one of the cities, like in the hills or something. Have this little rusty pile of garbage that looks like the parts from .15. Maybe have a couple ramshackle rockets and spaceplanes strewn about, propped up on trees nearby or something XD

I know easter eggs aren't supposed to be suggested but man...that would just be perfect.

I love the idea of Jeb's junkyard! LET THERE BE SCRAP!

P.S. +1
No,we have to keep the exact same texture,for the sake of nostalgia.

That would be awesome!!
Definitely. This would be an awesome addition. +1. I would really love this, especially with "cheaper and less efFEESHient parts.

Love the idea. If this is implemented, Jeb will finally have a place to send rocket supplies...

BTW, most current parts are pre-0.18 parts with newer textures and stuff, doing so would mean B9-Aerospace-style folder system...
